title: Mount Vernon
description: Home of George Washington, located in the Mount Vernon area of Alexandria. This spot is really popular to learn more about the history about the first president of the United States

title: George Mason University
description: Visit the most diverse public university in Virginia. At GMU, we are a R1 Research Institution with high levels of research. Offers a lot of programs that give students the most flexibility

title: Founders Park
description: Vist Founders Park. It's in Alexandria, Virginia in the Old Town Area. Here, you can be next to the Potomac River, and enjoy a nice view of Maryland and DC. Also, it's peacefull.
